page.title: 05LAND DEVELOPMENT
page.content: EVENTUAL POPULATION TARGET OF S.W.F. IS 18000. DEVELOPMENT HAS BEEN CAREFULLY CONTROLLED. COMPULSORY PURCHASE WAS USED AS A DEVICE TO CREATE LARGE AREAS OF LAND FOR RESIDENTIAL BUILDING.SMALLHOLDERS WHO HAD BOUGHT PLOTS FOR AS LITTLE AS Â£50 IN THE 1920'S RECEIVED COMPENSATION, THE AMOUNTS STILL CONTROVERSIAL TODAY AMONG ESTABLISHED RESIDENTS OF THE OLD VILLAGE. PLANNING REGULATIONS KNOWN AS "THE ESSEX DESIGN CODE", HAVE BEEN ENFORCED. THESE HAVE REQUIRED DEVELOPERS TO PROVIDE DETAIL PLANS FOR THE ALLOCATION OF HOUSES ON BUILDING PLOTS. HOUSES WERE TO BE CONSTRUCTED OF ONLY CERTAIN TRADITIONAL MATERIALS AND HOUSE STYLES STIPULATED SUCH AS BRICK COLOUR, ROOF PITCH AND WINDOW FRAMES.
